name: Survival War: Snow Sniper Pro
description:
Survival War: Snow Sniper Pro is a striking action FPS Sniper Best Game! Give you the real sniper game experience. This game brings exciting mission to complete the task. Keep your breath in control, lock your enemy, aim and shoot to kills the crazy rivals. Once you start shooting enemy they will know your presence, run away and search for you everywhere, attack you. No way to go back, so you have to be very cautious, fast and accurate in ruthless shooting sniper best game.
Game Features
First Person FPS Action Shooting Game
Thrilling, exciting & challenging missions
Numerous types of weapons, sniper rifles
Immersive 3D snow mountain environment
